hadith.text: Narrated (Another route) from Az-Zuhri:with this chain, and it is similar, but he said: "You can find a mount among them." - from Salim, from Ibn 'Umar that the Messenger of Allah (ï·º) said: "People are but like one hundred camels, you can not find a mount among them - or he said - you can not find but one mount among them
